title: Modern Central Borneo City Stay with Restaurant & Terrace Pool Bar
description:
Stay in the heart of the Pangkalan Bun's thriving commercial district at this chic Central Borneo stay. Your hotel is just a short journey from the world-renowned Tanjung Puting National Park, home to the largest orangutan population in the world.

Savour international cuisine at the onsite restaurant, relax with a cocktail by the pool or explore the city's rich Dayak culture and traditional floating markets. The hotel is only a 15-minute drive from Iskandar Airport, making it an ideal base for your Borneo adventure.
offer_address: Jalan Haji Udan Said, Kota Waringin Barat, Central Kalimantan, Pankalan Bun 74113, Indonesia
